mapper.insert: insert into SM_PAGE_BASE_TB (PAGE_ID, FORM_ID, PAGE_NAME, PAGE_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, CREATOR, MODIFIER, FACE_TYPE, FACE_PAGE_ID, PAGE_INDEX, DEAL_TYPE, SEARCH_INDEX, REC_TYPE ) values (#{pageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{formId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faceType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{facePageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pageIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{searchIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recType,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update SM_PAGE_BASE_TB
FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAGE_NAME = #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGE_TYPE = #{pageType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACE_TYPE = #{faceType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FACE_PAGE_ID = #{facePageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAGE_INDEX = #{pageIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEAL_TYPE = #{dealType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEARCH_INDEX = #{searchIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REC_TYPE = #{recType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where PAGE_ID = #{pageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SM_PAGE_BASE_TB set FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAGE_NAME = #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGE_TYPE = #{pageType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACE_TYPE = #{faceType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FACE_PAGE_ID = #{facePageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAGE_INDEX = #{pageIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEAL_TYPE = #{dealType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEARCH_INDEX = #{searchIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REC_TYPE = #{recType,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where PAGE_ID = #{pageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select from SM_PAGE_BASE_TB where FORM_ID in (select FORM_ID from SM_FORM_INFO_TB where FORM_NAME = #{formName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
